author: G Seetharaman
title: The tools that are saving the day
description: The tools that are saving the dayThe technologies being used against the pandemic are raising questions about excessive surveillance.
content:
The rapid spread of Covid-19 has forced countries to use every trick in the book to contain the disease. Some countries, like South Korea and Singapore, have done a better job than, say, Italy and Spain.
Asian countries have used a range of technologies in t… [+3474 chars]
